section.title: Introduction
section.para: The changelog describes the changes done in different versions of Luxoft Safe Renderer.

Each new major or minor release is based on an earlier release. For example, release 4.4.0 is based on release 4.3.0. All features and defect fixes that were part of 4.3.0 are also part of 4.4.0. However, if later on a defect is fixed in e.g. 4.3.1, it is not automatically part of 4.4.0 since 4.3.1 in that case would have been released after 4.4.0. The related defect has been also fixed in 4.4.x, if it is repeated in the changelog of e.g. version 4.4.1.
